N = int(input())
H = list(map(int, input().split()))

# 初期値を設定
max_move = 0
current_height = H[0]

for i in range(1, N):
    # 現在の高さより低い場合は移動回数をカウント
    if current_height >= H[i]:
        max_move += 1
    else:
        # 高い場合は現在の高さを更新
        current_height = H[i]

print(max_move)

# Read input
N = int(input())
H = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Initialize
max_move = 0

# Iterate through each square
for i in range(N):
    # Initialize
    move = 0
    # Iterate through each square to the right
    for j in range(i, N-1):
        # Check if height is greater than current square
        if H[j+1] > H[j]:
            break
        # If not, increment move
        else:
            move += 1
    # Update max_move
    max_move = max(max_move, move)

# Print result
print(max_move)

N = int(input())
H = list(map(int, input().split()))

max_move = 0
for i in range(N):
    move = 0
    for j in range(i + 1, N):
        if H[i] > H[j]:
            break
        move += 1
    max_move = max(max_move, move)
